recipesJson.name: White Hippo
recipesJson.author: Nickevz
recipesJson.description:
Kinder: white Happy Hippo

Crispy vanilla wafer shell with a white Nutella filling

I’ve got to be honest, this one didn’t take a whole lot of overthinking, I wanted to use my VT love again and at a high percentage so I picked a white happy hippo. 

The shell consists of WF crispy wafer and cap sugar cookie, the FA cookie just makes it a bit “crispier and darker”

The white Nutella filling comes from VT love, FA hazel grove and WF roasted hazelnuts, the toasted hazelnuts also helps the wafer out by darkening it up a touch and giving it a more baked vibe. 

Sweetener is subjective and drop it out if you wish but adds to the overall authenticity of the profile.

Ideally the mix needs 7 days but if you can’t wait then try it after 3 but the FA hazel grove does tend to taste a bit green and raw until it steeps out.
